holidays.title: Commitment Day
holidays.description: What promises have you made? It’s time to make them binding!

holidays.title: Copyright Law Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate a set of laws that ensures our creations are not misappropriated.

holidays.title: Ellis Island Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the monumental contribution of immigrants to the development of the United States.

holidays.title: Euro Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate one of the world’s most valuable currencies, along with the new year, of course.

holidays.title: First-Foot Day
holidays.description: Observe the custom of first-footing; be the first to step foot in your home.

holidays.title: Global Family Day
holidays.description: Did you know Global Family Day is an essential step towards world peace?

holidays.title: Haitian Independence Day
holidays.description: Come along with us as we travel back in time to pre-colonial Haiti.

holidays.title: International Public Domain Day
holidays.description: When the copyright of an artwork ends, it becomes the property of the public.

holidays.title: Mummer's Parade
holidays.description: Put on your best costume; we’re getting ready to go fully festive at the Mummer’s Parade!

holidays.title: National Bloody Mary Day
holidays.description: The famous cocktail consists of vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire, cayenne, and salt.

holidays.title: National Hangover Day
holidays.description: New Year's Day turns into National Hangover Day, read on for some tips on how to feel better.

holidays.title: National Shepherd Day
holidays.description: Let’s all set everything aside to celebrate that remarkable Shepherd in our lives!

holidays.title: New Year's Day
holidays.description: New Year's Day is about taking a moment to get ready for everything that is about to unfold.

holidays.title: New Year’s Dishonor List Day
holidays.description: Today, words and phrases that have become overused are voted for removal from the English Language.

holidays.title: Polar Bear Plunge Day
holidays.description: Nothing like plunging into icy waters to celebrate the first day of the New Year.

holidays.title: Public Domain Day
holidays.description: Look out for your favorite piece of historic work that becomes public domain this year.

holidays.title: Ring a Bell Day
holidays.description: Dive in to discover more about this holiday and, quite literally, ring a bell.

holidays.title: Rose Bowl Game
holidays.description: Get your football outfits ready as we gear up to celebrate "The Granddaddy of Them All!"

holidays.title: Solemnity of Mary
holidays.description: It is the eighth day of Christmastide and is a feast to celebrate Mary’s motherhood.

holidays.title: Sudan Independence Day
holidays.description: Get ready for some history lessons about an amazing nation and how they got their independence.

holidays.title: Tournament of Roses Parade
holidays.description: Celebrate the New Year with the entire family by attending the famous Tournament of Roses Parade!

holidays.title: Triumph of the Revolution
holidays.description: Raise your Cuban flags and show some marxism as we celebrate this historic day.

holidays.title: Universal Hour of Peace
holidays.description: Learn how to contribute toward peacebuilding in your community.

holidays.title: World Day of Peace
holidays.description: Light your candles in hope, as we celebrate the planet’s most sought-after thing: Peace.

holidays.title: Z Day
holidays.description: For a change and to honor the alphabet, allow the letter Z to come first.

holidays.title: George Washington Carver’s Birthday
holidays.description: Get the most exciting facts about the African-American botanist and inventor who changed the world.

holidays.title: Morris Chestnut’s Birthday
holidays.description: We have everything you need to know about the versatile actor, author, and producer, Morris Chestnut.

holidays.title: Poppy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented singer, actress, and YouTuber shows us that weird is the new cool.
